subtitle: Simply pears grilled with butter and a little honey. A quick and easy dessert.

method.text: Preheat grill to a medium heat. Line a grill pan with foil.
Peel and halve the pears. Scoop out the core with a teaspoon and discard. Brush the pears with the lemon juice. Lay cut side down on the foil-lined grill pan.

Brush the pears with some of the melted butter. Grill for 10 min or until pears begin to brown. Turn each pear over, brush with the remaining butter. Drop a little of the honey into the hollow of each.
Return to the grill and grill for a further 5-8 min or until the honey bubbles and the pears are lightly browned.

title: Grilled honeyed pears
